utterance.speaker: COSMO REPORTER
utterance.content: What's so special about world-famous mystery novelist, Richard Castle? He's rich, he's handsome, and he's basing his next best seller on you. Tell me, Detective Beckett, what's it like being the inspiration for thrill master Richard Castle's new character, Nikki Heat?

utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: On behalf of the NYPD, it has been a pleasure to offer Mr. Castle insight into the profession.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: Given all his best sellers, it's obvious Mr. Castle has tremendous insight into the criminal mind. I'm told in many occasions his participation was essential to solving your toughest cases.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Really? You were told that? By who?

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: By Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Can you excuse me for a moment?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sir? Could I talk to you in private for a moment, please?

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN ROY MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Detective Beckett, I have--

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Now.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: We had a deal, Beckett.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The deal is off.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: What's the problem?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not only does he have the bachelor party cop twins using him as a stripper pole, while I make nicey-nice with the press-- Do you know what he said?

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He said that he has been instrumental in helping us solve crimes.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Oh. Hasn't he?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That's not the point.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Do you know how hard it is for NYPD to get good press -- I mean in a magazine that people actually read? This article is very important to the mayor, therefore we are going to cooperate. Do I make myself clear?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. Fine.

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: Nice to meet you. We should have photo shoots here more often.

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey, Beckett, how come you don't wear a uniform like that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Because I don't want to get paid in singles.

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Oh, hey, don't we have that thing?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, you know, that thing with that guy.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that thing with the guy.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah. Excuse us.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I just wanted you to know I had nothing to do with this. I mean, it was the magazine, the mayor thought it would be good press.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You don't have to explain yourself.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don't?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. See, I don't care anymore. Now if you'll excuse me, I have an interview to get back to.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What did I do that was so wrong?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The one thing I asked you not to do.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, so you asked me not to look into your mother's murder, but look at what I found.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It doesn't matter what you found. I put that all behind me a long time ago. We can get back to the interview now.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No, you're going to have to re-schedule. We just caught a body.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So sorry to step out on you, Amy.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: Oh, are you kidding? It's perfect! A chance to see Castle in action. Our readers will love it.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Well, we wouldn't want to disappoint your readers now, would we, Detective?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey, can we talk about this, please?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There's nothing to talk about.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, then, at least let me know what I can do to make it up to you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You could leave me alone.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, yes, I tried that and it didn't work. Hey! I could buy you a pony!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Focus, Castle. A crime scene, okay.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It's raining men.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Don't worry, we're still mad at him.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Guy in a tree, Mom and Dad bickering. It seems like old times.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How's it going up there?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I got tree branches poking my boobs and a spotlight shining up my booty.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It could be worse, you could be wearing a skirt.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: When I come down I'mma smack you.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I'm looking forward to that.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Here. Vic's a white male, late mid-thirties. Judging from the cracked branches, I'm guessing he did a Superman off the top of that building.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Vic's name is John Allen. ID has him on the Upper West Side. Business card has him in insurance.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: Is it a suicide?

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: How do you know?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh, the building is too short. He'd want to kill himself, not cripple himself.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: If you want to die, you're gonna aim for concrete, not a tree. Judging from the angle of descent, I'd say the guy was thrown off the building.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Since it's clearly not a suicide, how did he die?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: There are signs of strangulation, looks like his windpipe was crushed.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Any ligature marks?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ligature refers to anything that ties or binds, like rope or a belt, anything that leaves marks -- suggesting he was strangled by hand.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: You really know your stuff; no wonder they like having you around.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know what, he's such an incredible resource it seems like a shame to waste his talents here in the field. Would you mind going back to the morgue with Doctor Parish to see what else you can find out about the vic?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Don't you think I'd be more use here at the crime scene?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh no. We're just gonna knock on doors and see what else we can stir up. You know, boring police stuff.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Fine. But I was serious about the pony. C'mon, I'll show you the morgue-mobile.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Anything in the wallet?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Nope. Dry cleaning ticket, ID, two credit cards. Cash was missing though.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That's a long way to go for a robbery.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: You mean we have to ride with the body?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: You can take my seat up front.

utterance.speaker: AMY
utterance.content: You sure?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Um hmm. I'm used to hanging out with stiffs.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Uh uh, you do not get to say hi to me. I'm just doing my girl a favour.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, you too, huh.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Well, what did you expect? Beckett spent the first three years of being a cop trying to solve her mother's murder. It took everything that she had to put it behind her, so you couldn't respect that?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What was I supposed to do? Not tell her what I found?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: What you found?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, she didn't tell you, did she? Three people were killed the same way her mother was right about the same time. One of them was a former law student of hers, another one, a documents clerk, the third one, a lawyer for a non-profit.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Wait, the M.E. at the time didn't make the connection?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: If he did, he buried it.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Did you talk to him?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He died four years ago. So you see why I had to tell her.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: What did she say?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That we were done. And then she just walked --

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Is that just me, or is that really, really weird?

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Well?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: He'll live.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What, no brain damage?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: If he has some, it happened way before before tonight and was probably self-inflicted.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ahh, good times.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: How's Lois Lane?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Who? Reporter chick? We took her statement and we sent her home. We got an APB on the sedan. CSU is combing the rooftop and we got unis looking for surveillance footage of the crash site.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You know what I don't get, is who would steal a dead body?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, plenty of people. Organ harvesters, cadaver-less med students, Satanists, mad scientists looking to create their own monster.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Or the guys who killed him might have left some evidence behind.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Boring. How about a spy having swallowed a top-secret micro chip that the enemy forces murdered him over before the CIA could get a hold of him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: As much as we all appreciate your insightful and incredibly believable theories, Miss Cosmo is gone, so I believe you can go home now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh no. Listen, this case just got good. And I'm a witness.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: All right, I'll let you work this one case with me, if you promise to leave me alone when it's over and not to weasel your way back in.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Deal. But fair warning, Detective, I will make you change your mind.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I won't.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You will. So what's the next step? Victim's family?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I didn't think she'd take him back.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mrs. Allen?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It's about your husband.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you know of any reason why he'd be in that part of town?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What time did he leave the apartment?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You said a trip?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did you notice anything unusual recently? Any strange behaviour?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And you're sure he was working late?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He didn't mean to imply --

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What about phone calls, maybe late at night?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle!

utterance.speaker: MRS ALLEN
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, one of the guys that John fired, Max Haverstock, he would call him up late at night and he would yell at him... all sorts of things. I guess he was hurting, he needed money. I told John he should just hang up on him. And John said no, he couldn't do that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did he ever give him money?

utterance.speaker: MRS ALLEN
utterance.content: My husband didn't believe in handouts. He believed that a man should make his way. Where is he? I'd like to say goodbye.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: About that, umm...

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That was awkward.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It's just...it doesn't make any sense. The guy has a stable, middle class life: good job, good family.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe his friend Max was jealous.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Maybe enough to kill him, but to steal his body? Hey Esposito, I need you to look up a friend of the vic, Max Haverstock. Yeah. Okay, find him and bring him in.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Dad! Thank God you're home. Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm fine, why?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Fine? Masked gunmen. Body snatchers. I texted you like a thousand times!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry, my phone must have been off. How did you know?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Beckett called.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: She just wanted to let us know you were all right.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Umm humm.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: So, has she forgiven you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh, not exactly, Mother. But I'm working on it. She has agreed to let me help on the case.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Well, that's a start, I suppose.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It is more than a start. It is an opportunity. She may have built a wall between us, but I am going to build a door in that wall. Or put up a ladder, or dig a hole.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: You have a strategy.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Be my usual charming self.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Uh huh, what about plan B?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: So was it awful? Were you scared?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Me, scared? No way. C'mon. Now excuse me while I change my shorts.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Dad.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, I was scared, but all they were after was the body.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Why, indeed. "Dad, where are you? Dad, are you all right? Dad, call us right away. Dad, can I go see Fame with Owen on Friday?" Your concern is touching.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Okay, that one was after I knew you were all right.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, but I thought we were going to see that together?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: We were, and we still can. But he invited me to go see it with him next Friday.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You'd rather go with your boyfriend than your dad. What is wrong with you?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: If you really want me to go with you, I will.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. No. You tell Owen he has won this round. But I got dibs on A Christmas Carol.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Thanks, Dad. And I'm glad you weren't killed by body snatchers.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Me too.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Ah, they re-made Fame and A Christmas Carol, has Hollywood totally run out of ideas?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, they just optioned Asteroid, the video game. So my guess is yes. But Ryan Reynolds is playing the wee triangle and he's good.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Ahh.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Are you sure this is the guy?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Maxwell Haverstock. And he confirmed he knew the vic.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This guy couldn't throw a wet sponge off a roof, let alone a body.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mr. Haverstock.

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you know why you're here?

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: No, they just told me I needed to come in.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It's about John Allen. He was murdered last night.

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: That's terrible.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You and he were friends.

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: We had adjoining cubicles.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: When was the last time you saw him?

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: Oh, not since D-Day. That's what we called it. D for downsizing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You were let go?

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I bet that made you pretty angry.

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: Yeah, fifteen years we worked there together. You know, you'd think that would mean something. You'd think loyalty would be worth something. You know what it's worth? A kick in the teeth.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did you ever call and tell John that?

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: Oh yeah, all the time. Yeah, I told him we didn't deserve to be treated like that, but I promised him one day the worm would turn, because karma is a nasty little bi***.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Is that why you killed him?

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: John.

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: Why would I want to kill John?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: For firing you.

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: He didn't fire me. We were let go together on D-Day. Fortunately, I was able to find another job.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He didn't have a job?

utterance.speaker: MAX HAVERSTOCK
utterance.content: I guess he uh...doesn't have to look for one anymore.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey, yo, Beckett. Story checks. John Allen was laid off eight months ago when the AIG crisis hit.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What about Albuquerque?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: No record of a John Allen coming back from a flight in the tri-state area.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It makes you wonder what else he lied to his wife about.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And how he paid all of his bills. Beckett. All right, thank you. They found his body. Again.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Someone operated on him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Operated?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: They cut him open and took all of his organs out.

utterance.speaker: ALL
utterance.content: Ooh! Ouch!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Somebody hated his guts.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: The guys who did this were not surgeons; the cuts were sloppy. Box cutters and kitchen knives.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Any idea what they were looking for?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I ran a tox screen and found nothing in the blood stream. But in the body cavity itself there were trace amounts of powdered cocaine.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He was their drug mule.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Guess they couldn't wait for him to pass the packets the old-fashioned way.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don't buy it. How does a middle-aged insurance actuary--with no history of substance abuse, no criminal record--become a drug mule? This was not a bad guy. You don't just fill out an ad on Craigslist. You gotta know people. Bad people!

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: As freaky as all this is, let's not forget it happened post-mortem. The actual cause of death is up here. Bruise pattern indicates the assailant strangled him with both hands.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The bruising is a little lighter right there.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What would account for that?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Broken or dislocated finger, maybe.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe he's fancy. Strangles people with his pinkie sticking out. Like tea.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Just got off with Homeland Security. Passport records indicate that John Allen was coming back from Mexico, not New Mexico.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No criminal history, healthy, white middle class... They wouldn't have looked at him twice at customs.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Man had skills. Why would he do something so stupid?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Because he had to. I just went over financials with the wife.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How bad?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: They been living on credit cards the last six months. She had no idea. She thought everything was fine.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, if he wasn't going to work every day, where was he going?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Applying for jobs. I found hundreds of cover letters and resumes on his computer.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don't understand -- why didn't they just sell the apartment?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It wasn't worth the mortgage.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That's harsh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Life insurance?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Stopped making payments four months ago. The guy was basically worthless alive or dead. Yeah, Ryan here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You know, I get desperation, I get needing money, I even get being a drug mule. What I don't get is where did he get the job?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, thanks, Bill. That was CSU. Our perp was wearing gloves; the only prints they could grab off the car belong to the owner who reported it stolen last night. Looks like we're not gonna be grabbing a break off of this one.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What about the glove we found at the scene?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We dusted it too. Nothing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, did you dust inside?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Inside?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, inside the glove.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You want me to put on some music? Whenever they do this sort of thing on CSI, they always do it to music in poorly lit rooms. Kinda reminds me of porn.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Zip it, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ever consider becoming a mohel?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Keep talking and I'll practice on you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Gotch'you, you son of a b****.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Boom! Got a hit. Luthor Whitehead. Busted twice for possession with intent and once on conspiracy. Pled out on all three. Did a nickel upstate for a gun charge and is currently on parole for conspiracy to distribute.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Something tells me his parole is about to be revoked. You got an address?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yup.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I have them dead to rights on weapons, possession, assault, desecration of a body, and about a dozen other things I haven't even begun to think about yet. What is my incentive to cut a deal?

utterance.speaker: LAWYER
utterance.content: You don't have them on the murder.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Give me time.

utterance.speaker: LAWYER
utterance.content: You don't need time because they didn't do it. Ten years concurrent on all charges, eligible in five. And they'll tell you everything they know.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He was coming to see you.
